meanings.sent1: Her virtues of honesty and kindness are admired by everyone.
meanings.sent2: The virtues of hard work and perseverance are essential for success.
meanings.sent3: His virtues of always being on time and never forgetting his keys make him quite the reliable friend.
meanings.sent4: The virtues of patience and understanding are like a soothing balm in times of trouble.
meanings.sent5: The virtues of courage and compassion shine brightly in her character.

meanings.definition: A good or useful quality of a thing.
meanings.sent1: The durability of this material is one of its virtues.
meanings.sent2: One of the virtues of this product is its versatility.
meanings.sent3: The virtues of this tool lie in its simplicity and efficiency.
meanings.sent4: The virtues of this recipe are its delicious taste and ease of preparation.
meanings.sent5: The virtues of this book include its engaging plot and well-developed characters.

meanings.definition: A quality considered morally good or desirable in a person.
meanings.sent1: Kindness is one of the virtues that define her character.
meanings.sent2: The virtues of integrity and humility are highly valued in society.
meanings.sent3: His virtues of always sharing his snacks make him the favorite colleague in the office.
meanings.sent4: The virtues of honesty and loyalty are the pillars of a strong relationship.
meanings.sent5: The virtues of generosity and empathy make him a beloved member of the community.
